Text: This is a joke- only 800MB of the 2GB is the Bocelli concert. The rest is a jumble of anti-semitic or luddite rants, as videos or pdf-s.

The joke is you, joo. Go buy the tape for $100 then, and stop complaining. Nothing is more pathetic than a tribal cult-mafia whose criminals think they're 'special chosen masters,' enough so that they can lie through their teeth, kill anyone and steal whatever they please, including people's land, houses and organs.
